column4: hi im working on a friends laptop and im booted up with a live usb stick i ran the disk utility program and it said that a few sectors on the harddrive are bad is the hd still stable to use?
i mean i know theres an increased chance of data lose but should i tell him to think about buying a new one?
considering the amazing cheap-ness of drives nowadays, its probably safer just to replace it...
you could also check the S.M.A.R.T. information on the drive to get more in depth diagnostic information
